meanings.sent1: The boat remained undocked in the calm waters.
meanings.sent2: The undocked ship swayed gently in the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The undocked boat seemed to enjoy its freedom from the dock.
meanings.sent4: Her undocked status made her feel unattached and free.
meanings.sent5: The undocked vessel looked lonely but independent.

meanings.sent1: The undocked seatbelt alarmed the driver.
meanings.sent2: The undocked latch swung open unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: The undocked door kept swinging back and forth in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His undocked shoelaces caused him to trip on the stairs.
meanings.sent5: The undocked leash allowed the dog to roam freely in the park.

meanings.sent1: The undocked boat drifted away from the dock.
meanings.sent2: The undocked ship slowly moved away from the pier.
meanings.sent3: The undocked vessel seemed to have a mind of its own as it floated away.
meanings.sent4: Her undocked kayak bobbed up and down with the waves.
meanings.sent5: The undocked yacht looked elegant as it sailed away from the harbor.
